title: (x) Serif face on "The thing about life…" book cover - Filosofia {Florian}
content:
Font ID of this book cover please.

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131905im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/123_6447.jpg)

 [‹ Can someone help me recognize these?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131905/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43425 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typical A again… ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131905/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43357 "Go to next forum topic")
author: richard_a

comments.content:
Hi Richard,

looks like [Filosofia](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131905/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/filosofia/) by [Zuzana Licko](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131905/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Zuzana%252BLicko).

F
